column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////Thank you for your review of Jinya Ramen Bar.  We're glad to see you are a regular guest at Midtown and I wanted to take this opportunity to thank you personally.  We have a new menu coming up later this month that will feature new ramen and new appetizers (try the new kale lollipop).  We look forward to seeing you again at Jinya Ramen Bar!
